original_text: but Peter stood outside at the door. So the other disciple, who was known to the high priest, went out and spoke to the servant girl who kept watch at the door, and brought Peter in.
korean_text: 베드로는 문 밖에 서 있는지라 대제사장을 아는 그 다른 제자가 나가서 문 지키는 여자에게 말하여 베드로를 데리고 들어오니

sentences.original_text: but Peter stood outside at the door.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 베드로는 문 밖에 서 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: who was known to the high priest,
and spoke to the servant girl
who kept watch at the door,
